Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 31st overall pick, by New York in 2020...
Traded from New York to Chicago on 6/30/2021 (Going to NY: LF Stephen Gullion, RF Michael Bitner. Going to CHI: P Jeffrey Horne, 2B John James, 3B Fausto Ocerin)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2022, off Matthew Gordillo (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2022, off Robert Gonzalez (SLB)...
Hit for the cycle against Kansas City on 5/10/2022...
Won Gold Glove at Shortstop in 2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2023, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,150,000 through salary arbitration...
